original_text: Then a war started in heaven. Michael and his angels fought against the dragon. The dragon and his army of angels fought against Michael and his angels.
korean_text: 하늘에 전쟁이 있으니 미가엘과 그의 사자들이 용과 더불어 싸울새 용과 그의 사자들도 싸우나

sentences.original_text: Then a war started in heaven
Michael and his angels fought against the dragon
The dragon and his army of angels
fought against Michael and his angels
